data.comment: The match is underway in Saitama.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Kobe needs to be cautious. Urawa have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 5, Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Urawa throw-in in Kobe's half.
In the minute 10, Urawa push forward at Saitama Stadium 2002 and Ryosuke Yamanaka gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kobe defence.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Urawa.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Keijiro Ogawa scores to make it 0-1 at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 15, That's a fine assist from Noriaki Fujimoto.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
In the minute 19, Daiju Sasaki of Kobe smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Saitama Urawa drive forward through Takuya Aoki. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 21, Kobe are coming forward and Dankler gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Kobe pushes forward through Keijiro Ogawa, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 22, Yuichi Nishimura awards Kobe a goal kick.
In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leonardo for Urawa drives towards goal at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 25, Urawa's Daiki Hashioka is on target but unsuccessful.
Kobe's Ryo Hatsuse misses with an attempt on goal.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Urawa.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Urawa have a dangerous throw-in.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Urawa just outside Kobe's area.
Urawa's Daiki Hashioka looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 32, Daiki Hashioka is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 33, Thomas Deng is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Kobe's Kyogo Furuhashi gets in a shot on goal at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Urawa drives forward and Leonardo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 36, Daiju Sasaki (Kobe) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Throw-in for Kobe at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Kobe.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Urawa throw-in in Kobe's half.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 39, In Saitama, Kai Shibato (Urawa) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saitama.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 40, Takuya Yasui of Kobe gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 42, Urawa's Yuki Muto gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kobe defender.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Kobe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Urawa's half?
In the minute 43, Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daiju Sasaki gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kobe.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 45, Can Urawa capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ryosuke Yamanaka (Urawa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, Urawa to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Kobe a goal kick.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 50, Noriaki Fujimoto for the away team is judged to be offside.
Noriaki Fujimoto (Kobe) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 52, Kobe's Dankler attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Urawa have a goal kick.
Yuki Muto (Urawa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 53, Urawa will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kobe.
Kobe drive into the zone and Ryo Hatsuse is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Shusaku Nishikawa for Urawa has been booked by Yuichi Nishimura and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 55, Free kick Urawa.
Urawa drive upfield and Leonardo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kobe defender.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Kobe.
Urawa make their first substitution with Koya Yuruki replacing Kazuki Nagasawa.
Shinzo Koroki is on a sub for Yuki Muto for Urawa.
In the minute 58, Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Ewerton is replacing Takuya Aoki for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
The away team replace Noriaki Fujimoto with Dyanfrez Douglas.
Leo Osaki is replacing Sergi Samper for the away team.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Important block from the Urawa defence as Dyanfrez Douglas fires in a strike for Kobe.
Throw-in for Kobe close to the penalty box.
The away team replace Daiju Sasaki with Hotaru Yamaguchi.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Kobe close to the penalty box.
In the minute 62, Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
Urawa are pushing forward but Ewerton's finish is wide of the goal.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
In the minute 64, Koya Yuruki for Urawa is whistled offside.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
In the minute 65, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Free kick for Kobe in the half of Urawa.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Urawa are pushing forward but Shinzo Koroki's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Dyanfrez Douglas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kobe.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 71, Urawa's Kai Shibato gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saitama.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 72, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Attention is being given to Kobe’s Ryo Hatsuse and play has been suspended briefly.
Thorsten Fink (Kobe) has taken off Ryo Hatsuse who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Gotoku Sakai is the replacement.
In the minute 75, The away team have replaced Kyogo Furuhashi with Yutaro Oda. This is the fifth substitution made today by Thorsten Fink.
Throw-in Kobe.
Urawa advance rapidly upfield but Yuichi Nishimura blows for offside.
In the minute 76, Yuichi Nishimura signals a Kobe throw-in in Urawa's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Urawa.
In the minute 78, Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Saitama, Dyanfrez Douglas (Kobe) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 82, Hotaru Yamaguchi is on target to give Kobe a 1-2 advantage.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 84, Kobe to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Gotoku Sakai (Kobe) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a throw-in for Kobe, close to Urawa's area.
Katsuya Iwatake is on a sub for Daiki Hashioka for Urawa.
In the minute 86, Tsuyoshi Otsuki is making the team's fifth substitution at Saitama Stadium 2002 with Kenyu Sugimoto replacing Takahiro Sekine.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Urawa.
Ryosuke Yamanaka for Urawa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 88, Yuichi Nishimura awards Kobe a goal kick.
In Saitama Urawa attack through Ewerton. The finish is off target, however.
Kobe have a goal kick.
Free kick Kobe.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Kobe.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Urawa throw-in in Kobe's half.
Goal kick for Kobe at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Urawa in Saitama.
Throw-in high up the field for Urawa in Saitama.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Dankler (Kobe) has received a first yellow card.
At Saitama Stadium 2002, Leonardo has been yellow-carded for the home team.
